Read the following text and answer questions 11 to 15: Sixty per cent of rural India lives in utter poverty with no electricity. Rural India uses 180 million tones of fuel every year for cooking, creating indoor pollution and health hazards... The purpose of the paragraph is to bringout:

options: (A) Who do not have any electricity.
(B) Who use solid fuel for cooking.
(C) Who live with pollution and health hazards.
(D) Who do not use cooking gas.

(D) fuel that does not give unpleasant smell.
